summary:
A terrible monster made his lair in the marsh of Skyrim.
Recommended for lvl 70 and above.
descriptionHtml:
[b][img]http://s13.postimg.org/r27vjc7wn/joskuungor.jpg[/img]
[b]

It's oriented for lvl 70 players and above, below levels are not recommended.
It is also recommended to go there with companions.

The lair respawn using the default  respawn rates.
Check the screenshots for more details on location and pics of the place.[/b]

[i][color=#6aa84f][size=3][b]FEATURES[/b][/size][/color][/i]
- A big tough ugly boss.
- A New location.
- Replayability. (uses default respawn rates)
[/b]

[u][i][b][i][b][color=#6aa84f][size=3]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/color][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u]
[b]Compatible with any mod that do not change or modify the same cell where the entrance of this mod is placed.[/b]

[u][i][b][i][color=#6aa84f][size=3]INSTALLATION[/size][/color][/i][/b][/i][/u]
[b]Put the .esp in the data folder.
Check the esp with your SkyrimLauncher.[/b]

[b][b][i][color=#6aa84f][size=3]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]
[/i][/b]- Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8+
- Dragonborn.
[/b]
[b][b][color=#6aa84f][size=3][i]ChangeLog:[/i][/size][/color][/b][/b]
[b]1.00 initial release
1.02 Cleaned with Tes5Edit
1.04 updated some clutter & lightning
1.10 Added follower support
1.20 Added paralyze immunity to the main boss[/b]

[b][b][i][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Credits:[/size][/color][/i][/b]
Bethesda for such an amazing game.[/b]
author: ebene
